geometricprimitives

Class MArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.Area
      • geometricprimitives.MArea
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class MArea
extends java.awt.geom.Area
    Represents a piece to be placed inside a Bin.
    Author:
    Moises Baly

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  MArea.ByArea
      Provides an area based comparison between two MAreas.
      private static class  MArea.ByBoundingBoxArea
      Provides a bounding box based comparison between two MAreas.

      • computeArea

        private double computeArea()
        Returns the area of this area using algorithm found at: http://paulbourke.net/geometry/polygonmesh/source1.c At the same time, updates this.area
        Returns:
        calculated area of this MArea

      • getFreeArea

        public double getFreeArea()
        Computes theoretical free space of this MArea, that is, area of the bounding box of this MArea minus the area of the MArea itself. The more irregular is the piece, the bigger this theoretical free area will be.
        Returns:
        theoretical free area

      • getPoints

        public MPointDouble[] getPoints()
        Returns:
        all contour points in this area, without repetition.
